means: 布兰（似巨人般的凯尔特人的上帝和不列颠统治者。在战斗中因伤致死后，他的头被埋葬在伦敦，以作为一种反对侵略者的保护力量）

word_mean: 麸，糠：分别由谷粒的表皮和外壳制成的粗粉

sentence.Network_en: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important and so is bran.

sentence.Network_en: Oat bran became the darling of health freaks last year.
sentence.Network_cn: 燕麦麸在去年成为保健狂人的最爱。

sentence.Network_en: Using a pestle and mortar, pulverise the bran to a coarse powder.
sentence.Network_cn: 用杵和臼，将麸皮磨成粗粉。

n 燕麦麸（Oat bran）片对奈非那韦引起的腹泻也有效。它们通过吸收液体、增加大便体积和减缓大便在肠道内的运动而止泻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French, of unknown origin

entry.def: Bran is the outer skin of grain that is left when the grain has been used to make flour.

example.ex: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important and so is bran.
example.tran: 新鲜的水果和蔬菜很重要，麦麸也是。

means.word_mean: 1. broken husks of the seeds of cereal grains that are separated from the flour by sifting
2. food prepared from the husks of cereal grains
